definition: thin piece/flake/a slice/film/TV play/to slice/to carve thin/partial/incomplete/one-sided/classifier for slices, tablets, tract of land, area of water/classifier for CDs, movies, DVDs etc/used with numeral 一[yi1]: classifier for scenario, scene, feeling, atmosphere, sound etc/Kangxi radical 91

sentences.english: He suffered from severe autism and still wore nappies.
sentences.chinese: 他患有严重的自闭症，甚至要使用尿片。

sentences.english: What kind of diapers does he use?
Diapers seem to be a stumbling block for everyone.
sentences.chinese: 尿片似乎对所有人来说都是个绊脚石。
这对夫妻不使用布尿片。

sentences.english: After all, disposable diapers have been around since the 1940s.
sentences.chinese: 毕竟，一次性尿片早在1940年左右就出现了。

sentences.english: Therefore, I bought some diapers again, this time is about the age of 13.
sentences.chinese: 因此我再买了一包纸尿片，这时约是13岁。

sentences.english: I need to figure out how to make diapers out of Poo Poo Paper.
sentences.chinese: 我需要找到用便便纸制作尿片的方法。

sentences.english: But it’s the most functional diapers we’ve found.
sentences.chinese: 但是一次性尿片是我们找到的最实用的尿片了。

sentences.english: But it’s the most functional diapers we’ve found.
sentences.chinese: 但是一次性尿片是我们找到的最实用的尿片了。

definition: to support a child (or invalid etc) while he or she urinates
